name: ClickHouse Export Plugin
description: Export PostHog events to a ClickHouse instance on ingestion.

config.markdown: Read [the documentation](https://github.com/ouesahlem/ClickHouse) here for instructions in getting these keys.

config.name: Does your Postgres instance have a self-signed SSL certificate?
config.hint: In most cases, Heroku and RDS users should select 'Yes'.

config.name: ClickHouse Database URL
config.hint: You can use a URL containing host, port, username, and password, or fill in these fields individually below.

config.name: ClickHouse instance host
config.hint: Example: `clickhouse.mydomain.com` (Required if Database URL is not specified)

config.name: ClickHouse instance port
config.hint: Default: 30851 (Required if Database URL is not specified)

config.name: Database name
config.hint: Required if Database URL is not specified

config.name: Table name
config.hint: The plugin will create a table with this name to store the events in

config.name: Username available to the plugin for accessing your database instance
config.hint: This user needs table creation access (Required if Database URL is not specified)

config.name: Password for the username specified above
config.hint: Required if Database URL is not specified

config.name: Events to include
config.hint: Comma separated list of events to include
